verses.verse: And God <WH430> spoke <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words, <WH1697> saying, <WH559>
I <WH595> am the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> which <WH834> have brought thee out <WH3318> of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
Thou shalt have <WH1961> no <WH3808> other <WH312> gods <WH430> before <WH5921> <WH6440> me.

Thou shalt not <WH3808> make <WH6213> unto thee any graven image, <WH6459> or any <WH3605> likeness <WH8544> of any thing that <WH834> is in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4480> <WH4605> or that <WH834> is in the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH4480> <WH8478> or that <WH834> is in the water <WH4325> under <WH4480> <WH8478> the earth: <WH776>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> bow down thyself <WH7812> to them, nor <WH3808> serve <WH5647> them: for <WH3588> I <WH595> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH410> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon <WH5921> the children <WH1121> unto <WH5921> the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation of them that hate <WH8130> me;
And showing <WH6213> mercy <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505> of them that love <WH157> me, and keep <WH8104> my commandments. <WH4687>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> take <WH5375> <WH853> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> in vain; <WH7723> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> will not <WH3808> hold him guiltless <WH5352> <WH853> that <WH834> taketh <WH5375> <WH853> his name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
Remember <WH2142> the <WH853> sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> to keep it holy. <WH6942>
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shalt thou labor, <WH5647> and do <WH6213> all <WH3605> thy work: <WH4399>

But the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God: <WH430> in it thou shalt not <WH3808> do <WH6213> any <WH3605> work, <WH4399> thou, <WH859> nor thy son, <WH1121> nor thy daughter, <WH1323> thy manservant, <WH5650> nor thy maidservant, <WH519> nor thy cattle, <WH929> nor thy stranger <WH1616> that <WH834> is within thy gates: <WH8179>

For <WH3588> in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> <WH853> heaven <WH8064> and earth, <WH776> <WH853> the sea, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> in them is, and rested <WH5117> the seventh <WH7637> day: <WH3117> wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the LORD <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the <WH853> sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> and hallowed <WH6942> it.

Honor <WH3513> <WH853> thy father <WH1> and thy mother: <WH517> that <WH4616> thy days <WH3117> may be long <WH748> upon <WH5921> the land <WH127> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee.
Thou shalt not <WH3808> kill. <WH7523>
Thou shalt not <WH3808> commit adultery. <WH5003>
Thou shalt not <WH3808> steal. <WH1589>
Thou shalt not <WH3808> bear <WH6030> false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> against thy neighbor. <WH7453>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> covet <WH2530> thy neighbor's <WH7453> house, <WH1004> thou shalt not <WH3808> covet <WH2530> thy neighbor's <WH7453> wife, <WH802> nor his manservant, <WH5650> nor his maidservant, <WH519> nor his ox, <WH7794> nor his ass, <WH2543> nor any thing <WH3605> that <WH834> is thy neighbor's. <WH7453>

And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the thunderings, <WH6963> and the lightnings, <WH3940> and the noise <WH6963> of the trumpet, <WH7782> and the mountain <WH2022> smoking: <WH6226> and when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> it, they removed, <WH5128> and stood <WH5975> afar off. <WH4480> <WH7350>

And they said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Speak <WH1696> thou <WH859> with <WH5973> us, and we will hear: <WH8085> but let not <WH408> God <WH430> speak <WH1696> with <WH5973> us, lest <WH6435> we die. <WH4191>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the people, <WH5971> Fear <WH3372> not: <WH408> for <WH3588> God <WH430> is come <WH935> to <WH5668> prove <WH5254> you, and that <WH5668> his fear <WH3374> may be <WH1961> before <WH5921> your faces, <WH6440> that ye sin <WH2398> not. <WH1115>
And the people <WH5971> stood <WH5975> afar off, <WH4480> <WH7350> and Moses <WH4872> drew near <WH5066> unto <WH413> the thick darkness <WH6205> where <WH834> <WH8033> God <WH430> was.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Thus <WH3541> thou shalt say <WH559> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> Ye <WH859> have seen <WH7200> that <WH3588> I have talked <WH1696> with <WH5973> you from <WH4480> heaven. <WH8064>
Ye shall not <WH3808> make <WH6213> with <WH854> me gods <WH430> of silver, <WH3701> neither <WH3808> shall ye make <WH6213> unto you gods <WH430> of gold. <WH2091>

An altar <WH4196> of earth <WH127> thou shalt make <WH6213> unto me, and shalt sacrifice <WH2076> thereon <WH5921> <WH853> thy burnt offerings, <WH5930> and thy peace offerings, <WH8002> <WH853> thy sheep, <WH6629> and thine oxen: <WH1241> in all <WH3605> places <WH4725> where <WH834> I record <WH2142> <WH853> my name <WH8034> I will come <WH935> unto <WH413> thee, and I will bless <WH1288> thee.

And if <WH518> thou wilt make <WH6213> me an altar <WH4196> of stone, <WH68> thou shalt not <WH3808> build <WH1129> it of hewn stone: <WH1496> for <WH3588> if thou lift up <WH5130> thy tool <WH2719> upon <WH5921> it, thou hast polluted <WH2490> it.
Neither <WH3808> shalt thou go up <WH5927> by steps <WH4609> unto <WH5921> mine altar, <WH4196> that <WH834> thy nakedness <WH6172> be not <WH3808> discovered <WH1540> thereon. <WH5921>
